Create Ride

body.raw:
{
"timestamp": "{{timestamp}}",
 "is_mobile": 1,
"start_lat" :"4.8942483",
"start_lon" :"-1.7564726",
"end_lat" :"4.915940654547596",
"end_lon" :"-1.7750701698710114",
"waypoint1_lat":"" ,
"waypoint1_lon" :"",
"waypoint2_lat" :"",
"waypoint2_lon" : "",
"waypoint3_lat" : "",
"waypoint3_lon" : "",
"start_location_name" :"Ama Akroma Avenue",
"waypoint1_name" : "",
"waypoint2_name" : "",
"waypoint3_name" : "",
"end_location_name" : "I. Adu Street, Effia Kwesimintsim"
}

request.description:
Create a ride by passing timestamp value, is_mobile and other required field values to the request body.

Pass **Bearer Authorization** access token  and user key from login response body to the request header


| Parameters   |               Description               |        Example             |
| -----------  |    ----------------------------------   | ---------------------------|
| timestamp    | Ten digit Unix timestamp to identify ride start time|  1648627237               |
| is_mobile     |  To identify that request is from the standalone app.Accepts the value 1 | 1 |
|start_lat | GPS latitude at the start point | 47.632|
|start_lon | GPS longitude at the start point | 47.632|
|end_lat | GPS latitude at the end point | 58.632|    
|end_lon | GPS longitude at the end point | 1.632|
|waypoint1_lat | GPS latitude at first waypoint  | 47.632|
|waypoint1_lon | GPS longitude at first waypoint | 47.632|
|waypoint2_lat | GPS latitude at second waypoint  | 47.632|
|waypoint2_lon | GPS longitude at second waypoint | 47.632|
|waypoint3_lat | GPS latitude at third waypoint  | 47.632|
|waypoint3_lon | GPS longitude at third waypoint | 47.632|
|start_location_name| Start location | Zrich| 
|waypoint1_name| first waypoint location | Winterthur| 
|waypoint2_name| second waypoint location | Lugano|
|waypoint3_name| third waypoint location | Berlin|
|end_location_name| endpoint location | Frauenfeld|

Filter users ride statistics in a year
* To filter ride stats by year,pass the number three(3) as value to the **filter_by** key in the request body.
eg; "**filter_by**" : **3**

Pass **Bearer Authorization** access token  and user key from login response body to the request header

eg; "**filter_by**" : **2**

Pass **Bearer Authorization** access token  and user key from login response body to the request header

item.description: Contains endpoints for filtering ride statistics for  a particular user

item.name: Fetch Rides

request.description:
Fetch all user rides in ascending or descending order. Pass the factor, order and page number in the request body.
* The factor key in the request body takes sorting type 
 eg; "**factor**": "**timestamp**" 
* The order key accepts 0 or 1 which represents ascending(old) and descending(recent) orders respectively
 eg: "**order**": **0**  sorts all rides by old time
 eg: "**order**": **1**  sorts all rides that are recent

Pass **Bearer Authorization** access token  and user key from login response body to the request header

exec: // pm.test("Response time is less than "+limit, function() {

//     console.log("Response time was longer than " + limit + " ms.");

request.description:
Fetch All favorited user rides in ascending or descending order. Pass the factor, order and page number in the request body.
* The factor key in the request body takes sorting type 
 eg; "**factor**": "**is_favourite**" 
* The order key accepts 0 or 1 which represents ascending and descending orders respectively
 eg: "**order**": **0**  for sorting rides in ascending order

Pass **Bearer Authorization** access token  and user key from login response body to the request header

item.name: Fetch User Rides By Ride Speed

request.description:
Fetch All rides in terms of ride speeds. Pass the factor, order and page number in the request body.
* The factor key takes sorting type 
 eg; "**factor**": "**average_speed**" for sorting rides in terms of average speed
* The order key accepts 0 or 1 which represents ascending and descending orders respectively.
 eg: "**order**": **0**  for sorting rides by their speed in ascending order

Pass **Bearer Authorization** access token  and user key from login response body to the request header

response.name: Fetch User Rides By Ride Speed

request.description:
Fetch all rides in terms ride duration. Pass the factor, order and page number in the request body.  
* The factor key takes sorting type 
 eg; "**factor**": "**ride_duration**" for sorting rides in terms of ride duration
* The order key accepts 0 or 1 which represent ascending and descending orders respectively
 eg: "**order**": **0**  sorts ride duration in the ascending order.

Pass **Bearer Authorization** access token  and user key from login response body to the request header

* Fetch ride data for a specific ride by passing the timestamp of the particular ride in the URL params.

Pass **Bearer Authorization** access token  and user key from login response body to the request header

| Parameters   |               Description               |        Example             |
| -----------  |    ----------------------------------   | ---------------------------|
| timestamp    | Ten digit Unix timestamp to identify a ride|  1648627237             |

request.description:
Endpoint to fetch unprocessed uploaded ride videos
* Pass the number **0** in the request URL params to fetch unprocessed ride videos

* Pass **Bearer Authorization** access token  and user key from login response body to the request header.

Endpoint to fetch in-process  videos.
* Pass the number **1** in the request URL params to fetch in process videos.

* Pass **Bearer Authorization** access token  and user key from login response body to the request header.

Endpoint to fetch processed  videos.
* Pass the number **2** in the request URL params to fetch processed videos

* Pass **Bearer Authorization** access token  and user key from login response body to the request header.

Endpoint to fetch without-rides 
* Pass the number **3** in the request URL params to fetch without-rides

* Pass **Bearer Authorization** access token  and user key from login response body to the request header.

Endpoint to delete in-process videos from Blob storage .
* Pass the id of video to the **video_id** key in the request body in json format


* Pass **Bearer Authorization** access token  and user key from login response body to the request header

Endpoint to favorite and unfavorite a ride by passing a boolean (true or false) to the key **is_favourite** and ride timestamp to **timestamp** key in the request body in json format.

| Parameters   |               Description               |        Example             |
| -----------  |    ----------------------------------   | ---------------------------|
| timestamp    | Ten digit Unix timestamp to identify ride|  1648627237               |

Endpoint to rename a particular ride. Pass the user key and timestamp in the request URL params.
* Pass the name of ride to **ride_title** key and the ride timestamp to the **timestamp** key in the request body in json format
* Pass **Bearer Authorization** access token  and user key from login response body to the request header

| Parameters   |               Description               |        Example             |
| -----------  |    ----------------------------------   | ---------------------------|
| timestamp    | Ten digit Unix timestamp to identify ride|  1648627237               |
